title: Irena Papst, PhD
text:
I’m a scientist specializing in infectious disease modelling.

I currently work as a mathematical modeller in the National Microbiology Laboratory’s Public Health Risk Sciences Division at the Public Health Agency of Canada
I am an adjunct professor in McMaster University’s Department of Mathematics & Statistics, where I help supervise students
I develop open-source scientific software and care deeply about reproducible research
I have taught several courses at the undergraduate level
